profile: Vinyl Window Pro is a great Canadian company which operates mainly in Alberta. We have been selling and installing top of the line windows and doors for reasonable prices since 1985. Vinyl Window Pro offers services in the outer and inner communities in Calgary. Theses areas include Okotoks, Bragg Creek, Airdrie, Cochrane and Chestermere; but that won’t stop us from going further! The largest reason for our success within our category of window installation and supply is that there are no high pressure, commission based sales people involved. We come to your home to show you real samples of windows or doors. The samples show our quality and energy efficiency of the products we offer. This allows your window advisor to assist you in choosing the type of installation and style of available products on the spot! We aim to match or improve all current looks in the home to ensure the flow of design is equal to your home and preferences. Another benefit for us coming to your home is to give you the price in a matter of minutes. There is no need to wait for days to get your quote; We know our product and we know how much it costs! Our teams want whats best for YOU in your home. Give us a call at 403-456-6748 or email in your request to info@vinylwindowpro.ca to arrange a free in home quote and see the difference!
service_area: Calgary , Edmonton , Red Deer and the rest of Alberta
products: Bow windows, Bay windows, Air Care windows, Tilt and Turn windows , Tilt and slide windows, Casement windows, Awning windows , custom shape windows ,sliding windows , hung windows. Steel insulated door systems, Fibreglass insulated door systems. Vinyl sliding patio doors, Vinyl French style doors, Professional Certified , licensed  installers . All of our windows and doors are ENERGY STAR rated and made in Canada . We offer double glass , triple glass, tempered glass, laminated glass, bronze glass and IS-15 / IS-20 glass
services: Supply and install windows, entry doors and patio doors, as well as enlarge basement windows for egress and fire escape
brands: Vinyl-Pro Window Systems , Sunview Patio Doors, EntryGuard Doors.
specialities: Egress cut outs, window installation, door installation, bow to build, bay to build, air care to build.
payment_method: MasterCard, VISA, Cheque, E-transfer or Financing available
diplomas: SeCOR, OHS, WHMIS, First Aid, Areal Platform, Fall Arrest.
warranty_terms: 25 years lifetime warranty transferrable to new homeowners

profile:
RVW Ltd is an Alberta registered and licensed company serving Canada since 1985. We specialize in residential and commercial window systems supply and installation for new construction and renovation projects.

We have a proficient team, experienced with all types of installations. In the past year we have completed over 350 projects for home owners and over 50 projects for businesses. We continuously carry out various projects for the City of Calgary, the Alberta Government as well as property management, architectural and design companies.

RVW Ltd has a solid reputation and excellent credentials. We have 10 out of 10 rating on Home Stars, A+ rating with BBB and can provide references from our major clients. Additionally, we have been a preferred contractor for Alberta Parks since April of 2016.

Safety is one of our main priorities and we’ve been holding a SECOR from June 15th, 2017. All required training, like Fall Protection, Aerial Work Platform, First Aid and WHMIS, is provided for employees. All of our employees follow our professionally developed Safety Program.
